creator: rob.audenaerde@valuecare.nl
text:
I have a Excel workbook with code signed macro's. I modify some cells in the workbook and save the file as a new file.

Somehow in the process, the code-signing of the macros is broken. 

See also: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8212589/how-to-sign-macros-in-excel-in-apache-poi

creator: yegor@dinom.ru
text:
Can you please upload the workbook and sample code that demonstrates the problem?

Yegor

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: No update in a long time, thus closing this as INVALID. Please reopen this bug with more information if this is still an issue for you.
